alert.note: Alert for Metro Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 1:16PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Broward County through 145 PM EDT... At 115 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sawgrass Mills Mall, or over Sunrise, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pembroke Pines, Hollywood, Miramar, Coral Springs, Davie, Plantation, Sunrise, Tamarac, Margate, Lauderhill, Weston, Coconut Creek, North Lauderdale, Lauderdale Lakes, Cooper City, Broadview-Pompano Park, Royal Palm Ranches, Sunshine Acres, Pine Island Ridge and Village Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
